origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CompetitorAnalysisAPI.compare_market_share', 'description': 'This function compares the market share of a specified company with its main competitors.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company, e.g., 美团, 饿了么.'}, {'name': 'competitors', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of main competitors, e.g., [饿了么, 百度外卖].'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'market_share_comparison', 'description': 'The comparison of market share between the specified company and its competitors.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CompetitorAnalysisAPI.compare_market_share, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'美团', 'competitors'是['饿了么', '百度外卖'].
